commit 35e52ed3ae570ffd84dee557aa863429c09b96b6
Author: Lee Mendelowitz <Lee@dhcp490-131.umiacs.umd.edu>
Date:   Tue May 7 15:23:33 2013 -0400

    hr:min format

commit 087325df841a08d4b789b9c5b58aa2e6f71800f1
Author: Lee Mendelowitz <Lee@dhcp490-131.umiacs.umd.edu>
Date:   Tue May 7 15:21:09 2013 -0400

    Do not launch twitter app as separate process
    
    Launching the twitter app as a separate process did not work so nicely,
    because with each redeployment of the app, I had multiple instances running.
    Instead, change the WSGI servers to run asyncronously (without blocking), and
    then run the twitter app from the main process as an infinite loop.
